title: Wanting to make a active and serious team!
body:
Hey guys im ellissouth a gold 1 adc main me and got a mate who i duo with who mains support currently gold 5 but gonna get him up. anyways wanting to build a active team with players who enjoy the game and want to build a team with each other and build synergy. idc about losing or winning as long as we improve . i am wanting to use the rest of this season building up the team and working on the basics etc communication, warding and more.

we looking for gold ++ Players who are active and dedicated. will sort out game night/days when team finally built.
people who are willing to communicate and enjoy the game
People keen to practice rotations and lane swaps
People keen to do scrims also in weekends.
Mid,Top,Jungle OPen Currently.

If interested feel free to add me in game. or leave a post ill get back to you. im on pretty much everyday.

replies.body: hey top main but have 180k mastry in azir have gold/plat mmr add me if you want to talk
sure i would love to join plat 3 atm jungle and support main
Hey man, I'd be keen. Currently plat5, i play top and mid. Add me :)
